articles.title: U.S. Tourists Could Soon Be Allowed Freer Travel to Europe - The New York Times
articles.description: The European Union is expected to recommend that member nations lift a ban on nonessential travel from the U.S., just in time for the summer tourism season.
articles.content: The European Union is expected to recommend lifting the ban on nonessential travel for visitors from the United States on Friday, opening for American tourists just in time for the summer season, whi… [+1230 chars]

articles.title: Euro 2020: Ronaldo breaks record as Portugal cruise past Hungary - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Ronaldo netted a double to become the European Championship’s all-time leading scorer.
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo became the all-time top scorer at the European Championships after two goals in the final minutes helped holders Portugal beat Hungary 3-0 in their Group F opener on Tuesday.
